title: How to Join the Dark Brotherhood in Oblivion

steps.title: Look for someone who is unimportant and can't really fight back.
steps.content: Look for someone who is unimportant and can't really fight back. A beggar would be a good candidate. There will be text displayed at the top of the screen after you've murdered a "worthy candidate", saying something to the effect of "Your murder has been witnessed by unseen forces". This is your cue to head on to Step 2.

steps.title: Do this immediately after you have murdered an innocent character.
steps.content: Do this immediately after you have murdered an innocent character.

steps.title: He'll introduce himself and instruct you to kill a man named Rufio.
steps.content: He'll introduce himself and instruct you to kill a man named Rufio. He'll also give you The Blade of Woe. This will happen shortly after you wake up.

steps.title: Rufio unsuspectingly awaits here.
steps.content: Rufio unsuspectingly awaits here. The Inn is located Northwest of Bravil along the Green Road.

steps.title: You can find the trapdoor directly to the left.
steps.content: You can find the trapdoor directly to the left.

steps.title: Rufio will be inside, most likely sleeping.
steps.content: Rufio will be inside, most likely sleeping.

steps.title: Sleep in the bed beside him once you've done the deed.
steps.content: Sleep in the bed beside him once you've done the deed.

steps.title: Once you wake up, Lucien Lachance will again greet you.
steps.content: Once you wake up, Lucien Lachance will again greet you. He will instruct you to go to Cheydinhal, enter the "Abandoned House", and speak to Ocheeva.

steps.title: Head inside where you'll find a wooden door to the "Abandoned Basement".
steps.content: Head inside where you'll find a wooden door to the "Abandoned Basement". Enter the basement where you'll find the ominous Black Door.

steps.title: It'll ask you a question:
steps.content: It'll ask you a question: "What is the color of night?" Answer "Sanguine, my Brother."

steps.title: This completes your initiation into the Dark Brotherhood.
steps.content: This completes your initiation into the Dark Brotherhood. Congratulations! You'll now be able to freely enter the sanctuary and acquire missions for the Dark Brotherhood quest line, not to mention receive an awesome set of shrouded armor.
